thread.title: Arizona recruit to be first openly gay scholarship player | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Arizona recruit to be first openly gay scholarship player | Daily Mail Online

author: Associated Press
title: Arizona recruit to be first openly gay scholarship player | Daily Mail Online

organizations.name: daily mail online university of arizona

text: University of Arizona recruit will be the first ever openly gay scholarship player in major college football history My-King Johnson, 17, is set to play for the University of Arizona this fall He will be the first openly gay scholarship player in major college football history Johnson came out to his friends and family when he was just 12 years old The 6-foot-4, 225-pound defensive end starred at Tempe High School Only a handful of college football players have come out publicly while playing
